Plot: Andrea, who is seven months pregnant, has to lie in bed for days and days at the hospital when her water breaks prematurely. She decides to escape the hospital world through her imagination.
Title: New Life
Writer: Kerry Bock, Camilla Bouchet, Nada Homsi, Michael Masurk
Actors: Camilla Bouchet, Nada Homsi, Kerry Bock, Mia Trouvé
